thread.title: FiveBox, LLC Announces Scott Stone as VP of Sales
thread.title_full: FiveBox, LLC Announces Scott Stone as VP of Sales

author: Douglas Shaffren
title: FiveBox, LLC Announces Scott Stone as VP of Sales
text:
FiveBox, LLC, a firm providing Technology and Software Development Services headquartered in Atlanta, GA announced today that Scott Stone has been appointed Vice President of Sales, effective immediately. Stone brings nearly 20 years of sales, operations, and account management experience to the FiveBox team. In his new role at FiveBox, Stone will define and implement the sales, marketing, and account management strategies for the firm.
"We are thrilled that Scott is joining us,” said Matthew Ohlman, Managing Partner at FiveBox. “Since the beginning, our firm has been committed to building software a better way. Scott’s experience, knowledge, and energy are a natural fit for this position and will help FiveBox continue to accelerate our growth."
Before joining FiveBox, Stone was the SVP of Sales at Xycast LLC, a technology startup in Atlanta. Prior to Xycast, he served as the VP of Sales at Sports Challenge Network where he expanded the partner base from a small operation to over 300 partners in 43 states and 8 countries.
"I am excited to join the FiveBox team,” said Stone. “This firm truly understands the importance of actually partnering with our customers to help them succeed instead of treating them like just another customer. I’m looking forward to supporting the rapidly expanding needs of the FiveBox team for many years to come."
About FiveBox, LLC
FiveBox, LLC is a provider of Technology and Software Services headquartered in Atlanta, GA. FiveBox was founded on the premise that software development should be delivered on time, on budget, and in line with stakeholder expectations. FiveBox takes pride in partnering with their clients, not just providing a service, in order to provide the best technology experience for businesses of all sizes. You can learn more about FiveBox by visiting http://www.fivebox.com .
